title: Student and Staff Computing Devices
installation: All deliveries and deployments must incorporate white glove services, which include asset decaling, asset reporting, etching, and delivery to varied locations.
delivery_date: Dallas ISD is anticipating requesting quotes for different projects from awarded vendors starting in September of 2024.
additional_documentation_required: Form 1295 should be submitted with the RFP response.
product: Chromebooks, Windows laptops, AIO Desktops, Tablets
product_specification:
**Chromebooks:**

- USB 3.1 port
- No touch screen
- One-year warranty

**Windows laptops:**

- USB 3.1 port
- Three-year warranty

**AIO Desktops:**

- USB 3.1 port
- Webcam
- Three-year warranty

**Tablets:**

- USB 3.1 port
- No touch screen
- One-year warranty
